keyMoments.description: Luffy's Devil Fruit powers are completely negated when he's trapped in a Seastone net, demonstrating the effectiveness of Seastone against all Devil Fruit users
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines' strategic knowledge of Devil Fruit weaknesses and their use of specialized anti-Devil Fruit weapons

reveals.description: The Gomu Gomu no Mi's vulnerability to Seastone is demonstrated when Luffy becomes completely incapacitated by a Seastone net
reveals.significance: Reinforces the universal weakness all Devil Fruit users share when exposed to Seastone
